h1: How Many Calories Are in a Monster Drink?

disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, brand formulation, and serving; check labels for exact values as recipes may change.

quick_answer.text: A standard 16 oz Monster Energy drink contains 210 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a monster drink?
faqs.a: A standard 16 oz Monster Energy Original has 210 calories.

faqs.q: Are there carbs or sugars in Monster drinks?
faqs.a: Yes, 54 g carbs and 54 g sugars per 16 oz can in the original; zero-sugar versions have 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in a Monster drink?
faqs.a: About 370 mg sodium per 16 oz can.

faqs.q: Do Monster drinks have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat in standard Monster Energy drinks; all calories from carbs.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by Monster flavor?
faqs.a: Original and most flavored are ~210 kcal; zero-sugar options are ~10 kcal per 16 oz can.
